name: Gummy Dash
description:
Are you one of the puzzle gamers playing match 3 games like jewel matching or candy blasting? Let's try a different thing: Gummy Dash. All the rules of match 3 games go for Gummy Dash, too. Swap the two near tasty gummy or lolly to dash three or more yummy gummies. Blast and get combo of special jelly gummy and lolly candy or go and use power-ups to bomb delicious and scrumptious gummy without match3.

Take a journey to fantastic and shining sweet gummy lands. Start your match 3 puzzle adventure on sublime green land then, burst gummy of icy land in a blue and violet environment. Go on your match 3 game gush on various candy lands filled with delicious cupcakes, tasty donuts, chewy taffy, and dashy bonbon. Create sugar combo , juicy twist , and striped milk gummy to dash more jelly , yummy and scrumptious gummy to be the best candy smasher.

Various match 3 missions are on your way:

1- Dash gummy in or around of blocks to break iron , wooden , icy chocolate blocks .
2- Drop gummy fruits such as strawberry candy and sweet plum by matching gummy candies under luscious fruits
3- Create great blaze and make huge combo to get high score before the moves finish or time is over

Match mouthwatering jelly gummy strategically. Check whether it is possible to dash four or five of gummy. If you can get striped gummy , yummy twist or gumdrop , it will be easier to drop more gummy. Show your brainpower in this brain training puzzle game. To crush gummy candy has never been so funny. Follow your match three adventure on level map offering different gummy gemmy lands . Life is sweet with these gumy juicy j jellies. Become the best candy smasher of everlasting chewy candies. Each crushed gummy increases your score. To play jelly match 3 games and to crash juice cubes is good choice to pass time. Instead of gummy bear or panda bear, there are lots of juice cubes, lolly and scrumptious; mouthwatering candies everywhere of this sugar land.

When you enter our candy kingdom, you will pass these sugarlands in turn:

1 - Gum Trees
2- Jelly River
3- Caramel Lake
4- Minty Rocks
5- Sugar Farm
6- Gummy Castle
7- Taffy Factory
8- Cupcake Festival
9- Candy Canes
10- Peppermint Mountains
11- Bonbon Shop
12- Gummy Canyon
13- Honey Pyramid

Features:

- Several juicy yummy match-3 levels
- Delicious combos , tasty power-ups
- Yummy lands with candy gummy like flowery green , icy , boiling , sweet dreamy
- Chocolate and ice blocks to burst
- Fruits like strawberry and plum to drop for a strawberry jam
